about_the_game:
Find Your Matching Pair

Lost in the mystical land of Sockhalla, you’ve been transformed into a sentient sock! Guided by the wise philosockpher, Sockrates, your journey is to navigate this whimsical world, forge sock-connections, and perhaps find your one true sockmate. Will you make it back to the human world, or will love keep you in the spin cycle forever?

🧦 Features

  • Quirky Visual Novel & RPG Elements

  • A heartwarming and sock-tingling adventure.

  • Meet Unique Characters – From the alluring Sock Fatale to the ever-smiling yet devious Game Host Sock.

  • Dynamic Choices – Every decision shapes your fate and affects your relationships.

  • Multiple Endings – Will you find love, or simply get lost in the laundry pile?

  • Mini-Games & Secrets – Try your luck and hopefully join the 1% of socks with the mini-game Trivia Per Shoe! Answer questions, earn money, and uncover hidden sock lore.

  • Original Soundtrack – Quirky and nostalgic, 90s gaming like tunes that will remind you of retro games!

🧦 Step Into Sockhalla

Explore a vibrant world filled with charming locations, witty dialogues, and groan-worthy sock puns. Seduce, befriend, or outsmart the eccentric citizens of Sockhalla, like the charming Sock Fatale.

SO -- are you ready to find your matching pair? Or will you be left unmatched in the dryer of fate?

name: Sock Dating Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1060 or better

short_description: A light RPG visual novel where your choices shape your relationships and outcomes with the sexiest of socks. Explore the woolderful world of Sockhalla, customize your sock, rizz up other socks, and discover ALL of the lore in this narrative-driven adventure.
